strings.Value: "I'm glad of a chance to relax a little, but… shouldn't we be busy hiding our tents? Or are we just going to leave it to luck?"
"I wonder — what if someone happens to walk past us tonight? Won't it be easy to find our camp, since we didn't bother to hide it?"
"I could explain how we might best conceal our camp, if such is your wish. I learned much while commanding a squad."
"I advised that we hide the camp. Monsters can be a problem, as are evil-minded people."
"Why hide from monsters anyway? If you don't kill one tonight, you'll be fighting it tomorrow along with its friends."
"I agree. I've no concern for sleep, but I require silence and repose no less than the rest of you."
